newsitem.title: BULGARIA: Bulgaria offers two T-bill issues Sept 23.
newsitem.headline: Bulgaria offers two T-bill issues Sept 23.

text.p: Bulgaria's Finance Ministry will offer two T-bill issues with a total par of 8.4 billion levs, both dated September 25, at separate auctions on Monday, the Bulgarian National Bank (BNB) said.
One of the issues has a one-year maturity and a floater coupon equal to the BNB's central interest rate for the period to maturity. The CIR is now set at an annual 108 percent.
The issue was offered with no minimum acceptable price set in advance by the ministry, the BNB said in a statement.
The second issue is a 49-day discount one.
Par value 3.2 bln levs 5.2 bln levs
